scripts.build: npm run build-node && npm run build-web
scripts.build-web: esbuild web/worker.ts --bundle --alias:onnxruntime-node=onnxruntime-web --outfile=build-web/worker.js && esbuild web/index.ts --bundle --outfile=build-web/index.js && cp -r node_modules/onnxruntime-web/dist/* web/index.html web/*.css htdemucs.onnx build-web/
